location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter encloses an invoice and a bill of lading for thirty bales of native sulphur, which have been consigned to the Governor in Council, on board the bugulah [buggalow], the Darabie,for the use of the Gun Powder Department.
